OrgName: Altair Global Services, LLC d/b/a Altair Global Relocation
activities: Collect and store an individual's personal information as provided by them, their employer or our third-party service provider while providing employee benefits regarding relocation for employment either temporarily or permanently.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) for non-human resources data.  EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for human resources data only.
